plot: A South Korean pilot crashes in North Korea but a village woman rescues him and nurses him back to health. During the retreat of January 1951, he encounters her again, now mad from her war experiences. He decides to help her as best he can.
title: Jeolmangeun eobtda
plot_es: A South Korean pilot crashes in North Korea but a village woman rescues him and nurses him back to health. During the retreat of January 1951, he encounters her again, now mad from her war experiences. He decides to help her as best he can.
